properties.areaDesc: Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 13 at 3:35PM EST until January 15 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds of 15 to 25 knots by mid morning Tuesday.
Those winds will become northwest Tuesday night. Waves will
build to 4 to 6 feet by Tuesday afternoon, then continue into
Tuesday nnight.

* WHERE...Holland to Manistee.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 4 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY
